title: Ballot Boxes Report
description: Regroups the information of all the ballot boxes.

electionEventId.description: A random 32 characters hexadecimal string identifying the election event. Corresponds to ee in the specification.

items.description: The list of ballot box information.

totalICHTest.description: The test ballot boxes' total number of swiss resident voters.

totalICH.description: The non-test ballot boxes' total number of swiss resident voters.

totalACHTest.description: The test ballot boxes' total number of swiss abroad voters.

totalACH.description: The non-test ballot boxes' total number of swiss abroad voters.

totalForeignerTest.description: The test ballot boxes' total number of foreigner voters.

totalForeigner.description: The non-test ballot boxes' total number of foreigner voters.
